meanings.definition: Clothing designed for physical activity or exercise.
meanings.sent1: I always wear my activewear when I go for a run in the park.
meanings.sent2: She bought some new activewear for her yoga class.
meanings.sent3: The activewear was so bright and colorful, it looked like a rainbow had exploded in the gym.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to exercise was reflected in her choice of activewear, like a superhero donning their costume.
meanings.sent5: The activewear was like a second skin, helping her move freely and comfortably during her workout.

meanings.definition: The category of clothing suitable for active pursuits.
meanings.sent1: The store had a wide selection of activewear for different sports and activities.
meanings.sent2: Activewear has become increasingly popular for both exercise and casual wear.
meanings.sent3: He felt like a professional athlete in his new activewear, even though he was just going for a walk.
meanings.sent4: The activewear industry is constantly evolving to meet the needs of active individuals.
meanings.sent5: Her closet was filled with activewear in every color imaginable, ready for any adventure.
